fields.name: Circle Coaster
fields.description: Keep your bar or table safe in style with our Circle Coaster. Crafted with the same attention to quality as our brews, it's not just functional but adds a touch of brewery charm to your home.

fields.name: Hoodie
fields.description: Embrace the brewery lifestyle with our brewery-branded Hoodie. Designed for comfort and style, it's perfect for chilly evenings at the taproom or exploring the outdoors.

fields.name: Magnet
fields.description: Add a touch of brewery flair to your kitchen with our brewery-themed Magnet. Whether it's holding up your shopping list or decorating your fridge, it's a small but mighty statement piece.

fields.name: Pint Glass
fields.description: Sip your favorite brews in style with our brewery-branded Pint Glass. Crafted for both form and function, it's the perfect vessel for enjoying the full flavor profile of our handcrafted creations.

fields.name: Square Coaster
fields.description: Elevate your beer-drinking experience with our Square Coaster. Featuring our brewery logo, it's not only a practical accessory but also a stylish addition to your home bar or kitchen.

fields.name: T Shirt
fields.description: Show off your love for craft beer with our brewery-themed T-Shirt. Made with premium fabric for comfort and durability, it's the perfect attire for beer festivals, brewery tours, or just hanging out with friends.

fields.name: Tote Bag
fields.description: Carry your essentials in style with our brewery-branded Tote Bag. Whether you're heading to the brewery for a refill or shopping at the farmers' market, it's the perfect accessory for any beer enthusiast.
